title: [Ember Ridge Orchard]
description: The ruts of a wagon track lead eastward, and rows of shadeless candles burn with bright amber-red flames to either side, lighting the way forward.  Dancing fitfully with the passing of even the slightest breeze, the candle flames offer something of a darker countenance to this part of the orchard, with the shadows beneath the fruit-laden tree limbs deeper and more animated as the ambient light flickers.
